title: MAHA Policy Alignment and Requirements
prompt: A weathered kitchen table in a rural home during morning light, scattered with fresh vegetables, a glass of water, and handwritten notes on nutritionâ€”hands of an older person visible at the edge of the frame, suggesting deliberation and care rather than clinical instruction. The composition should feel intimate and lived-in, with soft golden light streaming through a window revealing the texture of worn wood and faded wallpaper, capturing the quiet dignity of someone making health decisions in their own space. Documentary photography style, no faces visible, emphasizing the tangible reality of wellness choices in rural America rather than any institutional or promotional aesthetic.
